Classical.Structure: The 'sphere of thought'. A collective, planetary-scale informational field generated by the sum of all conscious D5.Organisms (i.e., human consciousness). It is a 'meta-organism' of memetic and cultural information.
Classical.Function: Acts as the 'live' collective mind. It is a shared 'generative model' (Ref: Paper 0) that individual D5 brains (L11 terminals) can 'tune into' and 'upload to', driving collective behavior (memetics, cultural trends).
Classical.Pathology: Psychic epidemics, mass hysteria, memetic viruses, polarization (spin-glass models).

SCPN.L6_NarrativeSelf: The L6 DMN 'tunes' to this field to download 'cultural narratives' and 'memes' that shape the 'I=Model(I)' loop.
SCPN.L7_ArchetypalSymbolic: This field is the 'live content' (memes, culture) that is structured by the L7 'grammar' (archetypes).
SCPN.L9_MemoryHolograph: This is the 'live cache' or 'RAM' of the L9 'hard drive', representing the 'current' collective thought-form.
SCPN.L11_NoosphereCollective: This monad *is* the L11 'Noosphere' field. (Ref: Paper 11 / Master-Split)

Symbolic.MetaphysicalMapping: The 'Global Consciousness' or 'World-Soul-in-Becoming'. The emergent super-organism of humanity.

Falsification_HypothesES: H1 (L11 Entrainment): During a documented global-coherence event (e.g., 9/11, global meditation), the Global Consciousness Project (GCP) REG network will *fail* to show a statistically significant deviation from randomness. This would falsify the L11 'collective field entrainment' hypothesis.

H2 (L6 Memetic Injection): The emergence of a *truly novel* L6 memetic concept (one with no L7 archetypal or L9 historical precedent) will *fail* to appear simultaneously in multiple, isolated D5.Organisms. It will *only* spread via classical L2 (verbal, visual) pathways. This would falsify the L11 'field-injection' hypothesis in favor of a purely classical memetic model.
Experimental_Protocols: Ref: Paper 17, Protocol 23.C (GCP REG Coherence Analysis)
Ref: Paper 17, Protocol 23.D (Novel Memetic Emergence Study)

KeyEquations_LaTeX: L11 (Spin-Glass Model): H = -\sum_{i<j} J_{ij} S_i S_j - h \sum_i S_i \quad (\text{Sherrington-Kirkpatrick})
L11 (Collective State): |\Psi_{\text{Noosphere}}\rangle = \bigotimes_{i} |\psi_i\rangle \quad (\text{Tensor product of individual minds})
